attributes.action: please stop the banks and building societys in this country charging us for having bank accounts, they aleady overcharge extortionate prices on us the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am fed up with the banking industy, the so called greedy fat cats now expressing there wishes so that they can or will be charging us for just having a bank account in the near future.
All they are bothered about is making more profit for themselves to line there pockets as well as the share holders.
I find this extremely worrying as they make extravagant profits through over charging on things like statements, overdraft charges, banking charges, some pin machines or atm machines that over charge to just for a cash withdrawal, credit cards even withdrawing over the counter with a bank card.
How are the poor and the elderly going to cope with even more charges.
Do something about it Mr Blair before your legacy turns into a nightmare.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
